content.detailedDescription:
Wed.8/26/2015 at 10pm day 1
i went to the gym la fitness on pinehurst rd. i took zumba class at 8pm.
i got out at 9:05 pm and went to the lady locker room, took a shower, put lotion on my entire body, i got dressed then fixed my hair.
at about 9:55pm i walked out of locker room to the la fitness parking lot and to my car. i unlocked my car and put my gym bag in the back seat then got in the car and looked at the clock it's 9:58 pm. i drove through the parking lot of la fitness and the parking lot of that strip mall. i turned right into phars rd and drove toward grayson to go home. i live in loganville near snellville and grayson. 
at the 1st stop sign on phars rd was north rd, there were two cars were waiting for their turns, mine was the 3rd car and the last car. i looked at the lock it’s 10 pm. when i proceeded to pass that stop sign i sneezed then i felt the fiction and vibration's  noise of car's tires against the road subsided then i saw tree branches passing by my car’s window. judging from the side of their leaves they must be very close within my arm reach.  my eyes were opened widely in dismay i do not understand what was just happened then all of a sudden darkness took over.  
when the light came back i saw the green street sign right by my eyes the sign of web gin house road. the white letter w was as big as my entire hand it must be right at my face and enlarged, it was moving upward. then i felt the fiction of the road against my tires again. i got too confused and scared i stopped at the side of the road to find where i was and wondered how i got there.  i looked at the clock it was 10:02pm.
i saw the traffic light about 1000 feet ahead so i drove up to see the name of the street. i found i was at the corner of web gin house rd and hwy ga. 20.  i was in lawrenceville city. how i got there was a mystery i did not see anything, i did not know how i got there in 2 minutes and in total darkness. i drove home from there i stop at mail box to pick up my mail. 
at 10:24 pm. i got homes, i locked all my doors and called my sister to tell her what was just happened to me. she said i should check my body. i checked my body i saw not thing wrong with me excepted my left arm felt paint. i looked at my left arm where the paint appeared i saw the fresh mark of a wound from a  needle like i got shot from the doctor's office. i just got a shot from a needle  it’s  about 3 inches above my elbow. when i put my finger on the wound i felt its hardness underneath about 1 cm depth. this wound was not here when i put lotion on my arm at the gym.  i must just got this shot  during the darkness took over. i was very confused and i was too scared to fall to sleep.

thursday 8/27/ 2015   day 2:
i couldn’t sleep because i was too scared to close my eyes. 
i do not do drug i do not smoke and i do not hang around drug or people who do drug i can’t be hallucinated i can’t explain how i got to lawrenceville from grayson in 2 minutes and i got a shot in the left arm. 

friday 8/27/ 2015   day 3:
i couldn’t sleep for 72 hours because i was too scared to close my eyes but i was not sleepy at all,  physically i never felt any better, i am full of energy as i was in my twenty. i was not tired or sleepy at all but i knew i must sleep so i took  sleeping medicine to fall sleep but every time i dozed off i felt like a switch in me turned on and switched me back to awake. i stayed up for 120 hours then finally i did some catching up with my sleep. i am waiting in dreadful to find out what will happen to me from that mystery shot.
content.summary: Abduction and being shot in the left arm by a needle

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work early in the morning. the sun wasnt up and i was the only one on the road. i travel this route every day. i noticed the object because of the blinding red lights that were shining from underneath. i first seen the lights, and while trying to understand where the lights were coming from, i seen the object they were attached to. as i got closer i began to slow down until i came to a complete stop in front of the object. it was hovering about 15 feet above an empty house. was not spinning, just hovering there. i could hear a slight hum, but it was very low. the lights were in the form of a triangle on the bottom of the craft. they did not blink. the three red lights remained on at all times. the object they were attached to closely resembled the shape of a skoll can. measuring maybe 20 feet across and 5-7 feet high. i wanted to park and get out. but as i pulled forward to pull into the driveway at the very same house the craft was hovering over, i began to feel fear. so i continued forward on my way. the object and lights remained visible to me for another half mile or so until the trees and winding road caused me to lose visual.
content.summary: Cylinder shaped craft with three red lights on bottom in triangle shape about 20 feet across and 5-7 feet high

content.detailedDescription: My partner was outside our front door when he spotted two low-flying ufos pass overhead about 8:45 p.M. one had a blinking white light and the other had orange-red blinking lights flashing in circular succession. once he told me about what he’d just seen, a few minutes later, i went outside and spotted a low-flying airplane going in the same direction that he’d seen the ufos fly. a few seconds after the airplane, a spinning disc-shaped craft flew overhead just above the tree tops in our front yard, hovering for a few seconds before flying in the same direction as the other aircraft. this completely silent ufo was flashing and rotating very bright orange-red and white lights in succession and appeared to be about 15 feet in diameter and came from the direction of the rising nearly-full moon and stayed in my line of vision for about a minute (as i followed it as far as i could before it flew above the forest and towards the pond. immediately after the ufo flew away, the sky suddenly became very busy with numerous aircraft all going in the same direction. one interesting aircraft that flew overhead had lights on its bottom outlining its boomerang/triangular shape. this aircraft did emit an airplane-like hum, so i’m guessing it may have been an advanced military plane. it’s interesting to note that the ny air show was taking place the next day about twenty miles from this sighting, so perhaps some of these aircraft were practicing stunts for the show. however, i did not see disc-shaped aircraft listed on the ny air show website like those that my partner and i witnessed. also interesting to note is that my friend saw an unusual brightly-lit cloud formation around the same time from queens, ny.
content.summary: We spotted discs with rotating red-orange and white lights and another with a pulsating white light just above the tree tops.

content.detailedDescription: 6 am was walking dogs and like always i looked up in the sky and did a double take.  at first i thought it was a star but this thing was huge.  i would say aprox. 10x the size of any other star in the sky (maybe 10th the size of a full moon).  the object didn't move at all.  it just stayed stationary for good solid 5 minutes.  i would say it was 4+ miles away from where i was standing.  i then had to go inside and get ready for work but the object remained in the same location.
content.summary: First thought was a star but it was 10x larger than any other star in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
summer of 1987  s. texas around alomo movie set as extra. went to small town 8 miles away to cash check on foot at 10:30 am, took a short cut from bending dirt road to the only straight paved high way to town. my dierections of sun were right. came to a dirt road for cars that would take me strait to highway then i felt tired? then i noticed i was on a single track trail made by animals, stop looked back to see single track as far as i could see and said to myself , this does not make sense and looked at suns color spectrum that told me that it was late after noon. i was lost. i went to high ground then i saw a spec light that showed me were town was and could see high way. i was on the wrong side of highway? then found a path to road and ended up in town at sun set. i was 17 years old and vary healthy back in 87. lost time and space and tired. 
  summer of 1988,phx. glendale sat. 8:55 pm i received a call from a friend girl known as alien child and convenced me to come over to her party and to hurry that the party had started. so i left at 9 o'clock ,speed walked 1 and half miles to her place. then i got there and there was no party. she pulled me in the house real fast and said she changed her mind about party. well i want a beer ! then she took me refrigerator and i pulled out a cold beer, open it and took a drink. it was cold and fizzy. she rushed me to the back yard and on the way there was a microwave oven that had the time on it,9:34 pm. it read and then i said to my self, thats good time and the right time. once out back she told me to lean back on wall like she did , then i sat my cold beer down on a plastic table in front of me as we shared a smoke and she said her dad had put up this flood lamp there as i look straight at it real fast then i noted that smoke was done after 2 puffs? then she was rushing me back into house. i grab my beer and it was hot and dry then i took a drink, it was hot and flat as if it had been over an hour. well it only was about the most 4 minutes that i got the beer. i looked at table for condenstion water then bent down to see if water was on cement, then something pitched me in pocket, i reach in pocket to find 2 red limestone type rocks, then looked at her and said were did these come from that i do not put rocks in pocket. she said i do not know now hurry in house. i had thrown rocks in yard then went in house and looked at clock, 10:57 pm. it should be 9:41 pm. ? i felt tired and she sang a song and had me leave. 10 years later i saw 3 saucers around 9:55 pm. as i was bike riding cavecreek rage on strang night that there was no air traffic. observed 1 up close and fuctions . one fuction was counter clockwise 4 main lights speeding up at stationary hover ,wobble and shruck down into a nutron ,gone! then few seconds later a spec of light that grew slowly back to its full size.      well i did not think about it untill the next night then started to draw and figure out how something would work like so then time went on and all these memorys flooded in that explans the night of 88. foward time travel speed of light and allusions. the future is nuked! 













 the future is nuked to the end of time n space
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Really neat scary stuff

content.detailedDescription: It looked like a oval/circled shape object in the sky. it had bright lights and  kept going around  circles. then it flew away really fast and vanished.
content.summary: It looked like a oval/circled shape object in the sky. it had bright lights and  kept going around  circles. then it flew away really fast and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: My husband an i heading to the store around 10:20 pm i notice some orange flashes behind some trees. i ask my husband if he seen it, and he said it was probably lighting. as we drive down the highway i noticed a bright orange light. i watched it for about 5 miles or so till it was out of view it never moved, but the orange lightening flashed around it a couple times. when we come back about 30-45 mins later it was gone.
content.summary: Bright orange light right above tree line

content.detailedDescription: Every night after it is becoming dark an object appears every night in the same spot,it just hovers and there a blinking light that change colors,every night its there and i will keep going out side and checking periodically and it will still be there and then it just disappears.It looks like a star but it changes to many color to be a star.This has been happing every nite now the only time its not visible is when its raining. this is very strange because it is there for long periods and the gone.There is no sound.I have never seen anything like it.It is amazingly strange.At frist i thought it was a star then i showed other family,i should be scared but my dad worked for nasa so its not really fear just confusing.
content.summary: There is a star like object that changes bright colors not normal and then disappears.

content.detailedDescription: 11:00pm flock of geese, very very loud came out of nowhere flew over house to the northwest. immediately to my east seen a fairly large round orange-yellow ball stayed bright for about 3 minutes then disappeared and came back for a few more minutes and disappeared.
content.summary: Yellow-orange round fireball

content.detailedDescription:
I make this report, going on fifty years after the event occurred, simply because it seems interesting.  we never were able to come up with an explanation for what happened, and though this is probably not as dramatic as some of your reports, you might find it unusual.

my friend bill and i were taking a short camping vacation in the white mountains, new hampshire, just before we started college in the fall of 1968 (he had just turned 18, and i was just about to; this would have been late august or early september – i have slides from the trip that were processed in september 1968).  high on our agenda was climbing mt. washington on the jewell trail, which may be accessed from the base station of the famous cog railroad there.  it was a hot sunny day, some 90 degrees at the bottom of the mountain, but as we got to and above the tree line a thick fog enveloped us.  by around noon we reached the top of mt. washington, and stuck around the general vicinity for a couple of hours or so.  in mid-afternoon we started back down.

we were about halfway down (or more) the 3.7 mile long jewell trail portion (the whole hike up is nearly 6 miles), well below the tree line, when i thought i heard something from down further along the trail.  i stopped and told bill to listen, but there didn’t seem to be anything to hear after a few seconds, so we continued walking.  i recall conditions as being sunny but somewhat misty/showery; the trees around us were dwarfed (maybe 15 or 20 feet tall) and one could see perhaps 175 to 200 feet into the woods.  i don’t recall there being much if any wind.   less than thirty seconds later i again motioned to bill to stop and listen.  over the next minute or two we heard a *sound* on the right (western) side of the trail describe what appeared to be a regular trajectory parallel to the trail, and moving uphill alongside it.  we saw nothing, but estimated that whatever caused the sound, were it 200 feet from us, would have been moving at about 15 miles per hour.

at its closest and loudest, the sound was very loud – as loud as a medium-sized helicopter would have been at 200 feet’s distance.  but, and most interesting, the sound itself varied not the slightest bit in pitch, tone or intensity, while otherwise sounding somewhat how a billion mosquitoes might sound – a kind of highish-pitched buzz/whine.  whatever it was, if it was something solid, it must have been on or near the ground as we most likely would have been able to see it above the trees had it been much above ground level.  it seemed rather close, rather than further away/louder/faster-moving.  again, there was no wavering of pitch and intensity such as one might expect from a huge swarm of moving insects.  it proceeded upslope, parallel to the trail, until we couldn’t hear it anymore.  the whole event only lasted at most a couple of minutes.

having no idea of what it was we stood silently as it passed, not being eager to run after it into the woods.  when it was gone we just continued down the trail, reaching the base station sometime after 4 pm, i think.  when we got there we asked the ticket person for the cog railway whether anything like this had ever been reported, and i distinctly remember him laughing and saying “oh, you must have heard a bear!”  well, i think not.

topo maps seem to show that there is nothing but sloping downhill forest to that side of the trail for about a mile, at which point the forest reaches the rather minor and unpeopled jefferson notch road at several hundred feet lower elevation.  i wrote to the forest service (or national park service—i forget which) to inquire about the event, but they were of no help.

both of us now have our ph.D.S, bill in applied psychology and myself in physical geography.  i still remember the event pretty clearly, i think, and i leave it to you folks to ponder further.  --charles h. smith
content.summary: In august 1968 a friend and i encountered a "moving sound" while hiking down the jewell trail near mt. washington, nh.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Driving near weaverville nc seen four what i thought we'd hot air balloons. but as i got closer i stopped the truck and took a picture just before the one on the right shoots up and to the right.It is gone in about two seconds way to fast to be a airplane or helicopter.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen 4 and one  shoot off and is gone in two seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from visiting my parents in burlington on a cold late december weekday night when i saw this object hovering above the intersection with different colored lights zig zagged across it's side.   it was approximately 200ft above the ground and probably 90ft-120 long.  i stopped the car about 500ft away to the side of the street to get a better view.   traffic was exceptionally slow that night.  over a period of 20-30 minutes it slowly moved from out of the intersection and seem to fade.  i was excited but perplexed at the same time.  i finished driving home in milwaukee without issue.  it was difficult to see its shape since it was dark colored except for those flood type of lights.  i would say it was more your standard saucer shape as best i could make out.   at first i thought it was a blimp but ruled this out due to height above the ground and being so stationary for so long.
content.summary: Coming home from parents in burlington on cold winter night and saw dark object with multi-colored lights hovering over hwy intersection

content.detailedDescription: I was vacationing in denver, colorado of last year. i decided to take a picture of the scenery & not the object it's self. 1-3 weeks later i started browsing through my photos. that's when i noticed what seemed to be a objected in the sky. i tried listing off the possibilities of what it might had been. my first two assumption was that it could have been simple the moon or a air balloon. but to me it just didn't fit the two characteristics.  so i then went on to assume the possibility of a spot on the window or on my camera lenses. i'm truly lost on what this might be. hopefully i'm not just naive of something so  explanatory.
content.summary: Unseen until browsing through photos.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my friends backyard and looked up to see a bright white star like object flying at incredible speed directly behind a commercial airliner. when it caught up to the plane it made a dead stop in front of the plane then perpendicular to my position and the plane it made a 90 degree turn shot straight up so fast that it just blinked off. right after it happened i told my friend and our girlfriends what i saw it was approximately between 8-9pm in the evening. they looked at me at said nothing. we happened to have the tav on at 11:00pm that night when the lead news story was "ufo sighted in the capital district" so there is a public record of this occurrence but unfortunately it occurred so long ago during my college years that i can be exact on the month or year. i'm pretty sure it was between the months of october to november and between 1973-1974. i just want to know if the news station still has the report. thanking you in advance for your time and consideration. 
sincerely,
jpn
content.summary: Bright star-like flew hi speed stopped in front of airplane then shot straight up. albany newscast at 11:pm reported ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: A bright white orb was glowing and moving north but then would hesitate and stop and then move again. it appeared at one point to split into different lights, green and blue, even some red, and then they switched sides as it moved overhead and continued north. at the same time to the east- there was a high flying pulsating orb moving at a high rate of speed to the south. it was considerably higher and could have been a plane in the clouds, we could not tell. the only reason we suspected it was not was because it was moving so much faster than normal jets we see at night- we live by palm beach intl airport and see a lot of air traffic.
content.summary: Bright white orb that split into three lights, then merged into two, the split back into three

content.detailedDescription: The ex wife and i were coming home from work at 3:30 in the morning on cole road out in the country. we reached the field and noticed a humongous craft hovering just above the tree tops not far off the road. i stopped the car and we watched it for a minute or so, i then turned off the car, rolled down the window and heard nothing, i could see something like heat waves being omitted from one part.The craft was so big and close it was hard to depict the shape, it could have been a triangle but from what i could see it was the shape of a cylinder block. i could not see the end of the craft but from the size i could see it was close to half a mile long, it was too close to determine shape and size, humongous is the best description. to get a better look i opened the door of the yukon and stood up on the floor and had my arms on the roof, not a sound. now here is the part i don't usually tell anyone. apparently they noticed us and they turned on the inside lights, it was a huge window and in the window were three beings, two taller thin ones and a shorter one in the middle. because the light was behind them they were silhouette in black, but the form was the exact beings you normally see, very thin with large heads. the thing that really stood out... besides the entities was the light, this was 1993 or 1994, not sure of the date it's been a while, but the light was a pure white, like nothing i have seen before. then the three beings waved at us, this scared the crap out of us and we took off for home a few hundred feet away. we ran in the house and watched it from the window, than it just disappeared. we were so flabbergasted that i did not think to take a video or photo. i don't recall any missing time. i don't tell that many people i have seen a ufo and only family members know about seeing and being waved to by aliens, i don't want people to think i'm nuts. i have seen a show that had a far away video of kind of what i saw.
content.summary: Came upon a huge craft 30' tall probably 1/2 mile long 30' off the ground 100' away from us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my home (i live on the 32nd floor so i'm up in the sky)
i was laying on my bed reading a book and i got thirsty so i got a drink of water and decided to look out of my window i looked over to where st.Paul is and i saw a orangey red light in the shape of a line hovering i thought it was just a ride from the fair but then thought no rides go up that high and i noticed it was a few miles from the state fair it sat there for about 4 seconds and then changed into the form of a ball and slowly faded away out of sight. after it happened i thought "damn i should've taken a picture" so now i thought i should share that.
content.summary: Red-orangish light in the shape of a line formed a ball and faded

content.detailedDescription: Walking on a golf course, saw a red orb a little ways in the distance hovering over the tree tops. it was so bright and still i thought it might have been a planet. when i pulled out my phone to see if it could have been mars, it flashed once and shot straight up into the sky. i got a weird feeling like it knew i was watching it for a good half hour before it vanished into the sky. the time was around 5-6 pm eastern time.
content.summary: Red orb hovered over tree tops then flashed bright and shot into sky when tried to get a picture.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were in the yard observing the night sky, due west an object appeared with red orange light almost white in the center, it could of had three lights hard to tell. it moved slowly northeast. we could not ascertain if it was a plane for the lights were not spread out. then a white solid object fell from the ufo and went straight down fading into oblivion the glow from the ufo made this easy to see it was not apparent if there was a trail but a very subtle almost indistinguishable glow behind the falling object which appeared oval, the ufo moved ne and further away another object fell and went straight down again disappearing from sight fast with again a slight trail. the ufo then suddenly vanished whilst moving. the night sky was foggy, the air thick. i would estimate the ufo to be moving over the area of the west side of buffalo close to or above the niagara river. i am on linwood avenue looking due west the object was in sight line with lexington avenue which runs west and then vanishing to the north east. speed was constant, it was the falling orbs that were most disturbing. time 9:20 pm, duration 3 minutes. object was below cloud cover at 5000 feet or more at 50 degrees.
content.summary: First observed object to the west moving northeast glowing orange red, a white orb dropped from ufo and went straight down, ufo continued moving ne and then another white object fell from it descending down and disappearing, ufo faded out suddenly after

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my patrol car facing east with my driver side window down. as i finished making entries into my laptop i happened to look north and noticed an unusually bright small cloud in totally dark surroundings. soon after i observed a bright light flying a straight slow path from a west to east direction with bright white smoke billowing from its left and right position (not from behind like a rocket). it was so slow that it seemed like it was going into a hover. i could not identify what this was. i've never seen anything like it. i also noticed maybe two smaller flashing lights trailing from its left and right that seemed to be following it or were flying with it. i quickly grabbed my cell phone and began to record as soon as possible. the light continued its easterly direction, disappeared behind a small cloud, then reappeared at the other end when it produced a small ring of smoke similar to a pebble hitting a calm lake. soon after the light was out of my view due to more clouds in its path. i served 11 yrs in naval aviation and never witnessed anything like this. hope this helps you out.
content.summary: Appeared to look like a bright light flying inside a baloon. bright smoke trails surrounding it.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was getting on the school bus this morning around 6am (9/2/15) and took a few pics of this weird "orb" above our condo in miami beach. (biscayne point). she watched it for about 10 mins and had a hard time trying to explain what it was, or even an opinion of what it could be. light reflecting off clouds? atmospheric conditions? bermuda triangle?
content.summary: Strange tear drop light trail spotted above condo in miami beach

content.detailedDescription: About 6 am i went to let my dog out into the back yard. i opened the door and looked  out to make sure there were no animals in the yard. when i looked directly in front of me about  30 feet away. i saw an object shaped like an egg. it was about 15 ft tall and it was about 5 ft wide at the bottom and about 12 ft at the top. it shimmered from the top to the bottom and i could see right through it to the trees behind it. it was hovering about 5 or 6 ft off the ground . my dog usually runs off the deck and around the yard. she stopped at the top of the deck and looked in the direction of the object. she did not move while the object was there. it did not have any lights or make any noise . i looked at it for 1 or 2 min and it just disappeared like someone shut off a light. the yard was still no movement in the trees or any of the plants.My dog ran off the deck and over to the location of the object and was sniffing the air. i went out to the spot but i did not see anything. i have been in this house for 30 years and have never seen anything like this before or since.
content.summary: Egg shaped object in back yard hovered  5 ft off ground about 2 min  then  gone

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone by field investigator l. flechtner at mufon hq on 9/2/2015  in 1977 memorial day was monday the 30th and labor day monday september 5th.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

it was in the summer of 1977 or 1978, after dinner, about 6 pm, while celebrating either labor day or memorial day, my brother and i were out side playing. my father, brother and i saw a brushed silver disc hovering and moving slowly down the valley. 
my brother saw it first and pointed at it alerting me to it. we got our dad from inside the house and he saw it too.
it hovered over the ball field across the street, and i could have hit it with a rock. it made no sound, had no windows or doors, and appeared to have a non shiny aluminum finish. it had no lights and appeared to come from the direction of the arsenal. it freaked us out because it was so big and made no noise. it wobbled and had rounded edges like the nose of a 747. it was about 200 feet in the air, it was about 30' across and 10' high tapering to about 3' on the edges. it was silver but did not reflect the sun and was not shiny. when it left it traveled straight as an arrow down the valley over the trees and out of sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: In the summer of 1977 or 1978 my father, brother and i saw a brushed silver disc hovering and moving slowly down the valley

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking some shots of a sunset from inside my conservatory and could see two orbs as i looked out.  initially i thought it was some reflection on the glass or smears that were reflecting. so i went outside to take the pictures. looking through the lens i don't recall seeing the orbs again and took a series of shots (16 in total) over about 8 mins whilst looking  directly into the sun.    unfortunately as i could not see it with my naked eye i discontinued taking pictures, although wish i had the video going!   still left wondering if its some trick of the light? hopefully you will be able to tell me?

two and a half hours later i was again looking out of the same window, same direction and saw just sitting above the coastline (much higher up in the sky) a very bright flashing yellow/white light.  at first i thought it was the lights of a helicopter as it appeared stationary and there was no red flashing light so i was sure it was not an airplane however it was there for so long, about 5 mins. it then made what appeared to be a very quick zigzag motion, dissapeared for a split second and reappeared much higher up again not moving just flashing for maybe 10 seconds before fading altogether.  i'm always watching the coastline lights and the stars and had never seen anything that has confused me like this before.
content.summary: strange moving orb with glowing lights showing up on series of photos.

content.detailedDescription: Overnight security at a construction site. sitting in the ne corner of the property with a female security guard. we both look up and see it, i immediately record the object moving and take pictures of it. after it was gone i took pictures and video of the flight trail. the ufo was white and very bright. it appeared as a solid ball of light showing no shadow of a solid object like a plane or rocket. it flew into the sunrise and was no longer visible after flying behind a cloud, even though the trail was still visible up until the point it disappeared at. to travel from the coast to thay point of about 1.5 miles, it took a solid 2 minutes.
content.summary: Solid white ball of light, had no physical qualities, had no shadow of solid object

content.detailedDescription: I have made on 07.17.2015 around 08:30 , 3 pictures from the 22nd floor of the westin leipzig hotels , gerber straße 15 , 04105 leipzig , germany . view to the south , towards nicolai church . when looking at the photos unusual objects have found in the photos . the photos were taken with the camera in my phone sonyz1
content.summary: Objekts on fotos

content.detailedDescription:
I was attending a concert at red rocks amphitheater on june 20, 2015. between 9:30 and 10:30 pm i pulled out my phone to simply take a picture of the city lights from the denver-metro area looking east from the venue. i did not notice or see the object at all when i was taking the picture. i only noticed this flying object after i went back into the gallery of my photos a couple days later and noticed a strange flying craft up above in the sky. i was unable to observe the actual flight pattern or direction the craft was following which i really wish i could describe. 

when i first looked at the picture i thought it was simply an airplane or possibly a helicopter but after looking closely for a minute, the distance that this object seemed to be compared the size of a typical airplane or helicopter did not feel right. to me, a plane or helicopter would have been much smaller and possibly flashing red/white/yellow lights like they typically would during a night flight. 

when zooming in to the picture it becomes far too pixelated to make out an exact shape of the craft. however, there are 2 distinct lights visible in the image that are parallel to each other horizontally. the lights are a lighter, almost turquoise, green and within what visible in the picture, appear to bear rotating in a counter clockwise direction, in sync with one another. there also appears to be a another light that is much less vibrant than the other 2 coming off the right side of the image. 

there appears to be a physical craft attached to these apparent, green lights, and i can almost make out the shape of a tail to the craft but it is not definite. 

i would really just like to know what i could have potentially captured, be it a military vehicle, a commercial flight, or whatever it could be. i really just wanted someone to tell me i'm crazy and that this has a simple explanation. 

thank you for taking the time to read my submission.
content.summary: Large object in flight with 2 similar, horizontally parallel, green lights.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot of my business smoking a cigarette.  i looked up and i saw an object that looked like a plastic bag, but it was very high up in the air and did not seem to be moving with the wind.  it was hovering, and looked like it was waving back and forth, at the same time it looked like it was transforming in shape.  i went inside and got my dad and at the same time a customer had pulled up and all three of us observed it and could not explain what we were seeing.  it looked as if a plastic bag would, if it was being blown around by the wind, however this object was not moving at first then the object began slowly ascending and floating towards the east until i lost it in a cloud.
content.summary: Looked like a plastic bag floating

content.detailedDescription: I was around 10 years old in my hometown. it was around 6pm and i was in our driveway with my sister, uncle, and mom. it was a clear, cloudless day with calm winds, a typical laredo day. i was hoping the neighborhood kids would trickle out onto the street for kickball soon. my mom was talking with the neighbor to the north of us, both leaning against the chain link fence. it got quiet suddenly. no one talked anymore. no one moved either. i look up in the sky to the south east for some unknown reason. i see a shiny ufo less than half a mile away, about four stories (?) up in the air. it's a shiny seed-shaped metal object. i don't see any rivets or moving parts or doors or windows. it looks silver but with a slight gold tinge to it. i knew it was a spaceship. i point it out to my sister. she becomes anxious (she's always been a very nervous person) and tries to alert my uncle, who happens to be a few feet away from us, much closer than my mom. he does not respond. i yell to my mom and she doesn't respond. my sister's continued pleas are finally met by a few small grunts and a slight head motion from my uncle. he still won't respond properly. i tell my sister that we should keep our eyes on it and be ready to run since our family members are hypnotized or whatever. i don't feel scared. i'm just trying to be prepared for anything since i have to look out for my little sister. we stare at it. it continues to hover and rotates slightly. after a few minutes, it starts to ascend at a slow but steady speed. it goes straight up and vanishes in the upper atmosphere. once it's gone, i start hearing my mother start talking again. i turn to see them responsive again. the adults go back to normal and don't recall anything unusual. my sister looks at me with confusion and starts to get nervous again. i try to comfort her and tell her it's okay because it's over. i hug her and she starts to calm down.
content.summary: My sister and i spotted a hovering ufo. after a few minutes it went straight up and was gone
